name: Save the plates! (Squash the creeps but better)
name_original: Save the plates! (Squash the creeps but better)
description:
The original idea is from the project called Squashed the creeps, but instead of just making the same simple plain game, I gave my creativity a shot. Thanks to GDQuest, my Godot 3D learning experience is super easy.

Assets and music by me .

if you noticed, main character is the blender logo, just in 3D.

Controls:

WASD / Arrow keys   -    movement

Space    -   jump

F   -   brick wall preview / place brick wall 

9  -  ??
